title: Love Island Australia's Cartier Surjan and Adam Farrugia speculate whether they are related
text:
Love Island Australia's season two debuted on Monday night.

And as the singles get to know each other, two flirty stars were shocked to discover they may be related to one another.

On Wednesday's episode Cartier Surjan and Adam Farrugia became concerned after candidly discussing their family heritage.

Shock twist! Adam Farrugia (right) and Cartier Surjan (left) threw another shock twist into the mix, when it was revealed they could potentially be related to each other

Siting by the villa's pool, the subject of their family surnames made them question their relation.

When Adam told Cartier that his surname was Farrugia, she looked shocked and replied: 'Stop! Farrugia? That's my grandma's last name, because I'm half Maltese.'

Adam then quipped: 'Bull s**t! Mate, oh-oh! We're probably brothers and sisters.'

The pair then awkwardly laughed out loud.

The 27-year-old then picked up his mic and said: 'I'm going to have check the family tree, can I please get one. I'm going to need a family tree before I continue.'

Are we related? When Adam told Cartier (pictured) that his surname was Farrugia, she looked shocked and replied: 'Stop, Farrugia! That's my grandma's last name, because I'm half Maltese'

Oh, no! Adam (pictured) quipped: 'Bull s**t! Mate, oh-oh! We're probably brothers and sisters,' before he and Cartier laughed out loud

While the pair were only joking about their unexpected kinship, they also revealed in their video confessions that they would like to get to know each other better.

'Yeah, she's like a really nice girl. She's really reserved. Completely different. Completely opposite to me,' Adam later revealed about Cartier.

'Cartier might ground me just because like we're so opposite. I don't know. It's only early stages. It's only early days.'

Stop right now! Adam (pictured) picked up his mic and said: 'I'm going to have check the family tree, can I please get one. I'm going to need a family tree before I continue'

Pleased to meet you! Earlier in the episode, Cartier (pictured) admitted: 'Adam is surprising me every day. His banter has drawn me to him. I love the sense of humour'

Earlier in the episode, the 19-year-old beauty admitted: 'Adam is surprising me every day. His banter has drawn me to him. I love the sense of humour.'

Adam and Cartier's family tree speculation came after it was revealed on Monday's premiere that Adam had laid eyes on co-star Vanessa Sierra before.

Video footage emerged on Tuesday that showed the newfound reality stars out with friends at a restaurant back in May.

Although they weren't seated next to each other, both Vanessa, 24, and Adam can be seen sitting just a couple of people apart.
description: On Wednesday night's episode, two more contestants threw another shock twist into the mix, when it was revealed they could potentially be related to each other.
authors: Mark Brook For Daily Mail Australia
